title: Play Bridge with Omar Sharif
brief_description: Play bridge with Omar Sharif is an exciting video where you bid and play fifteen challenging bridge hands with Omar Sharif as your partner. During the program, Sharif, a world class bridge champion, offers his personal playing tips while Grand Master Truscott adds her expert commentary on bridge strategy.
